segments.text: I catch a glimpse of the outside world through the window, so calm and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a stark contrast to the turmoil bubbling inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her dish, seemingly unfazed by the chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of sympathy for those kids; their excitement is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a blend of innocence and recklessness, as the boy stretches for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation is almost infectious; I can’t help but smile a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, my heart races at the thought of what could happen if he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s frustrating to know that she remains unaware of the potential mayhem unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I look back at the puddle, growing and spreading like a warning sign.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she would just turn around and notice the little disasters at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR
